name: Crypto Multi-TF Volatility Breakout
description: Momentum strategy that trades Bitcoin and Ethereum using a multi-timeframe volatility breakout on 1-hour bars confirmed by daily volatility. Entries occur when both 1-hour and daily realized volatility exceed the 75th percentile of their respective 30-bar distributions and 1-hour volume is above its 20-period SMA. Exits are triggered when 1-hour volatility drops below the 50th percentile or the daily close falls under the 10-EMA. Risk is capped at 2 % of equity per trade with a 1.5×ATR stop and 3:1 reward-to-risk ATR-based target.
